channel.title: Emote Tabs + Telleports
channel.description:
hey guys,
im not used to changing what emote tabs as i use delta, but im trying to code a very blank czar base, i was wondering how do you add test to the tabs and make them tellport, the magic tabs are just blank at the min ,
any help apprecited , thanks
lewis`

item.title: Emote Tabs + Telleports
item.dc:creator: @lewis2 lewis`
item.description:
@lewis2 wrote:

The Reaper X:

To change the text on them you’re going to look in TextHandler.java. To change what they do, you’re going to look for their action button and change what the action button does. If you’re already set with teleporting emotes (if you’re server already has emotes that teleport you somewhere) look for where it teleports you to and change that. If they don’t teleport you already, you’re going to have to find out the action button of each emote button and use that as a switch case under case 185.

alright thanks for the info, im working on a very blank czar base … is czar stable do you kno of?

Read full topic

item.title: Emote Tabs + Telleports
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

To change the text on them you’re going to look in TextHandler.java. To change what they do, you’re going to look for their action button and change what the action button does. If you’re already set with teleporting emotes (if you’re server already has emotes that teleport you somewhere) look for where it teleports you to and change that. If they don’t teleport you already, you’re going to have to find out the action button of each emote button and use that as a switch case under case 185.
